Welcome to my website. I'm a retired Professor of Biology at the University of Washington (Seattle).  My main research is in ecological and evolutionary physiology. I'm still active in research in thermal biology of ectotherm, success and death rates of Himalayan mountaineers, among other topics. I'm also an avid hiker, backpacker, and home cook.
